item.description: Azure Logic Apps (opens new window) provide the central integration solution for your applications and services. Logic Apps run your workflows serverless, without managing infrastructure.

item.title: Welcome to » DVD Laser Scanner Microscope
item.description: The laser scanning microscope is a special light microscope which uses a focused laser beam to scans the sample.
